column4: how can I stop my webcam light from staying on when im not using it when my pc boots up?
yea my cam works with it
I just dont' know why the light is on when my pc boots up to ubuntu but if I run a app with a cam and turn it off then the light shuts off
either the module driving your webcam has a led option or just unloading the module or putting it to blacklist and loading it when needed only will do the trick.
